trigger.match: ^With a guttural chant\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) places a hand on your chest and sucks the nourishment out of your body\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_feed__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) frowns in frustration\, unable to suck any nourishment from your body\, although (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e does manage to weaken your constitution\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_feed_constitution__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) chants harshly at you\, while cracking [hH](?:is|er) knuckles loudly\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_shrivel__

trigger.match: ^The flesh on your (left|right) (arm|leg) shrivels to the bone\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_shriveled__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) points at you and utters a string of terrible sounds\, which leech(?:es)? away your mental reserves\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_leech__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) pronounces that you are under an ill omen\, and a sense of imminent foreboding descends upon you\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_omen__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) curses you with the visage of a rotting corpse\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_disfigure__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s eyes roll back into [hH](?:is|er) head and (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e begins to chant ugly\, discordant words\. With each syllable uttered\, white\, viscous smoke oozes out of [hH](?:is|er) mouth\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_ectoplasm__

trigger.match: ^The smoke envelops you\, leaving behind a thick coat of sticky slime\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_ectoplasmed__

trigger.match: ^(?:Several flies from the black cloud of filth fly into your mouth\, turning into a putrid sleaze that makes you gag and choke uncontrollably|A foul feeling churns in the pit of your stomach)\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_contagion__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) chants harshly while laying ([hH](?:is|er)) hand upon you\. Searing pain flashes through \2 touch and where \2 palm touched\, a deathly mark has been burned into your skin\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_deathmark__

trigger.match: ^The grim mark on your body suddenly darkens (slightly|greatly|brilliantly)\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_deathmarks__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to chant in a deep and baleful voice\, and an iron cross rises up from the ground before you\. Vicious spikes slam into your flesh and nail you to the cross\. You scream in pain and agony as blood is splattered in all directions\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_crucify__

trigger.match: ^You jerk as the iron cross pulls your limbs\, resulting in a sickening crunch of bones\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_crucified_jerk__

trigger.match: ^You bleed like a stuck pig upon the iron cross\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_crucified_bleed__

trigger.match: ^You can\'t concentrate enough to focus on your mind as you are crucified\!$
trigger.name: necromancy_crucified_nofocus__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) lightly strokes your flesh\, and the cold of the grave seeps into your bones\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_lichdom_touch__

trigger.match: ^The cold of the grave seeps into your bones\, causing you to shudder\.$
trigger.name: necromancy_lichdom_coldaura__
